segments.text: Yes , there aren't any clouds in the sky and we've got such a beautiful view here . Look ! This is St James Park . And there's Buckingham Palace
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It's on the other side of the Palace .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's the place where people make speeches on Sundays , isn't it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , you're right . Politicians of all kinds , religious people , and one or two madmen .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , are we going there today ? I want to take shots there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . I can see you're enjoying your trip today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . Everything's so striking and fascinating .
segments.speaker: S1
